name: Cant Take My Eyes Off You
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
         Can’t Take My Eyes Off Of You – Frankie Valli 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Written by: Bob Crewe/Bob Gaudio
From: "The 4 Seasons Present Frankie Valli Solo" (1967)

Tabbed by: maguri
Tuning: Standard

Had a closer look at some chords and tried to incorporate the brass
section into the guitar accompaniment. Some choices are difficult to
make, so I’m thankful for comments and further suggestions!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
CHORDS

          E-A-D-G-B-e
F#/E      0-x-4-3-2-2
F#m/E     0-x-4-2-2-2

E         0-2-2-1-0-0
Emaj7     0-2-1-1-0-0
E7        0-2-0-1-0-0
Am6       x-0-4-2-1-0
C#7(#9)   x-4-3-4-5-x  or (less Hendrix) x-4-3-1-0-0

F#m9      2-4-2-2-2-4
F#madd9/B x-2-4-2-2-4
B7-9      x-2-1-2-1-2
E6(add9)  0-2-x-1-2-2
G#m7      4-6-4-4-7-4
D9        x-5-4-5-5-5  or (easier) x-x-0-2-1-0

G         3-x-0-0-0-x
Gmaj7     3-x-4-4-3-x
G7        3-2-3-0-3-x
C         x-3-2-0-1-0
Cm6       x-3-1-2-1-x
A/G       3-x-2-2-2-x
Am/G      3-x-2-2-1-x

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Intro]
| [ch]F#/E[/ch] | [ch]F#m/E[/ch] | [ch]E[/ch] | % | 
| [ch]F#/E[/ch] | [ch]F#m/E[/ch] | [ch]E[/ch] | % | 


[Verse 1]
                [ch]E[/ch]
You're just too good to be true
              [ch]Emaj7[/ch]
Can't take my eyes off you
              [ch]E7[/ch]
You'd be like heaven to touch
        [ch]A[/ch]
I wanna hold you so much
              [ch]Am6[/ch]
At long last love has arrived
            [ch]E[/ch]
And I thank God I'm alive
                [ch]F#/E[/ch]             [ch]F#m/E[/ch]
You're just too good to be true
              [ch]E[/ch]
Can't take my eyes off you


[Verse 2]
           [ch]E[/ch]
Pardon the way that I stare
                [ch]Emaj7[/ch]
There's nothing else to compare
             [ch]E7[/ch]
The sight of you leaves me weak
             [ch]A[/ch]
There are no words left to speak
          [ch]Am6[/ch]
So if you feel like I feel
              [ch]Emaj7[/ch]
Please let me know that it's real
                [ch]F#/E[/ch]             [ch]F#m/E[/ch]
You're just too good to be true
              [ch]E[/ch]
Can't take my eyes off of you


[Bridge]
| [ch]F#m7[/ch] | [ch]B7[/ch] | [ch]E[/ch] | % |
| [ch]F#m7[/ch] | [ch]B7[/ch] | [ch]E[/ch] | [ch]C#7(#9)[/ch] |
                 (break)


[Chorus]
           [ch]F#m9[/ch]              [ch]F#madd9/B[/ch] [ [ch]B7-9[/ch] ]
I love you baby, and if it's quite alright
           [ch]G#m7[/ch]              [ch]C#7sus4[/ch]
I need you baby, to warm the lonely nights
  [ch]C#m7[/ch]     [ch]F#m7[/ch]  [ch]B7sus4[/ch]   [ch]B7[/ch]        [ch]E6add9[/ch]  [ch]C#7[/ch]
I love you baby, trust in me when I say
          [ch]F#m9[/ch]                 [ch]F#madd9/B[/ch]
Oh pretty baby, don't bring me down I pray
          [ch]G#m7[/ch]                [ch]C#7sus4[/ch]   [ch]C#7(#9)[/ch]
Oh pretty baby, now that I've found you stay
           [ch]F#m7[/ch]              [ch]D9[/ch]      
And let me love you, let me love you
                           (break)


[Verse 3]
                [ch]G[/ch]
You're just too good to be true
              [ch]Gmaj7[/ch]
Can't take my eyes off you
              [ch]G7[/ch]
You'd be like heaven to touch
        [ch]C[/ch]
I wanna hold you so much
        [ch]Cm6[/ch]
At long last love has arrived
            [ch]G[/ch]
And I thank God I'm alive
                [ch]A/G[/ch]             [ch]Am/G[/ch]
You're just too good to be true
              [ch]G[/ch]
Can't take my eyes off you


[Bridge]
| [ch]F#m7[/ch] | [ch]B7[/ch] | [ch]E[/ch] | [ch]C#7(#9)[/ch] |
                 (break)


[Chorus]
           [ch]F#m9[/ch]              [ch]F#madd9/B[/ch] [ [ch]B7-9[/ch] ]
I love you baby, and if it's quite alright
           [ch]G#m7[/ch]              [ch]C#7sus4[/ch]
I need you baby, to warm the lonely nights
  [ch]C#m7[/ch]     [ch]F#m7[/ch]  [ch]B7sus4[/ch]   [ch]B7[/ch]        [ch]E6add9[/ch]  [ch]C#7[/ch]
I love you baby, trust in me when I say
          [ch]F#m9[/ch]                 [ch]F#madd9/B[/ch]
Oh pretty baby, don't bring me down I pray
          [ch]G#m7[/ch]                [ch]C#7sus4[/ch]   [ch]C#7(#9)[/ch]
Oh pretty baby, now that I've found you stay
           [ch]F#m7[/ch]              [ch]D9[/ch]      
And let me love you, let me love you

(fade out over this last chorus)

[Verse]
[ch]E[/ch]
I should have stayed at home
[ch]E7[/ch]                                                               [ch]A[/ch]
'Cause right now I see all these people that love me but I still feel alone
               [ch]A6[/ch]       [ch]B[/ch]
Can't help but check my phone
[ch]E[/ch]
I could have made you mine
          [ch]E7[/ch]                                                               [ch]A[/ch]
But no it wasn't meant to be and see I wasn't made for you and you weren't made for me
          [ch]A6[/ch]        [ch]B[/ch]
Though it seemed so easy...

[Verse]
                   [ch]E[/ch]                         [ch]G#[/ch]
And that's because I wanna be your favourite boy
               [ch]A[/ch]
I wanna be the one that makes your day
                  [ch]Am[/ch]
The one you think about as you lie awake
[ch]E[/ch]                              [ch]G#[/ch]
I can't wait to be your number one
                     [ch]A[/ch]
I'll be your biggest fan and you'll be mine
                        [ch]Am[/ch]
But I still wanna break your heart and make you cry...

[Verse]
              [ch]E[/ch]
But won't you wait
              [ch]E7[/ch]
You know it's too late
          [ch]A[/ch]
I'm on my own shit now
       [ch]Am[/ch]                                  [ch]E[/ch]
Let me tell you how it feels to be fucking great
  [ch]E7[/ch]          [ch]A[/ch]
I feel great
   [ch]Am[/ch]
Woah oh oh oh oh
            [ch]E[/ch]
You need to be yourself
       [ch]E7[/ch]                                                                  [ch]A[/ch]
Love someone for loving you instead of someone really cool that makes your heart melt
                [ch]A6[/ch]       [ch]B[/ch]
Who knows what you truly felt

content.text:
------------------------------------------------------------------
                      Overview (Please Read)
------------------------------------------------------------------
This is an acoustic guitar arrangement for the song Let It Go, from Disney's Frozen. 
This arrangement was made because of the difficulty of transposing an orchestral 
score to acoustic guitar, and combines parts unique to the soundtrack version with
parts unique to the single (Demi Lovato) version. Some chords had to be changed 
because the two versions are in different keys. This arrangement uses the original
soundtrack key of A flat major (starting in the relative minor). Like most songs 
that use a capo, these chords are transcribed by the chord shape, not the chord sound.
That is, despite fingering a G chord, you're actually play Ab.

------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------PLEASE NOTE----------------------------
-   This arrangement is different then any recorded versions     -
-                    and is intended to be                       -
-          Please do not comment about any inaccuracies          -
-              compared to either recorded versions              -      
------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------
                         Chords and Tuning
------------------------------------------------------------------
Key of Ab Major

Standard Tuning
Capo on 1

Chord Shapes

[ch]G[/ch] (320033)
[ch]D[/ch] (xx0232)
[ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch] (200233)
[ch]C[/ch] (x32010
[ch]Cadd9[/ch] (x32033)
[ch]Em[/ch] (022000)
[ch]Em7[/ch] (022033)
[ch]A[/ch] (x02220)
[ch]Am[/ch] (x02210)
[ch]Asus4[/ch] (x02230)
[ch]G/B[/ch]  (x20033)
[ch]Gm/Bb[/ch] (x10033)
[ch]Cadd2[/ch] (x32030)


-------------------------------------------------------------------
                             Let It Go
-------------------------------------------------------------------


[Verse 1]

    [ch]Em[/ch]                      [ch]C[/ch]                      [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]Asus4[/ch]   [ch]Am[/ch]
The snow glows white on the mountain tonight not a footprint to be seen
  [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]                  [ch]Asus4[/ch]    [ch]A[/ch]
A kingdom of isolation and it looks like I'm the queen          
[ch]Em[/ch]          [ch]C[/ch]                 [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Asus4[/ch]    [ch]Am[/ch]
The wind is howling like this swirling storm inside
[ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]                     [ch]A[/ch]
Couldn't keep it in, heaven knows I've tried

                    
[Pre-chorus 1]
[ch]D[/ch]                                 [ch]C[/ch]
Don't let them in, don't let them see
                                    [ch]D[/ch]
Be the good girl you always have to be
                                    [ch]C[/ch]
Conceal, don't feel, don't let them know
               [ch]Cadd2[/ch]
Well, now they know


[Chorus 1]
 
       [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]
Let it go, let it go
      [ch]Em7[/ch]             [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
Can't hold it back anymore  
       [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]
Let it go, let it go 
      [ch]Em7[/ch]              [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
Turn away and slam the door
[ch]G[/ch]       [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]          [ch]Em7[/ch]      [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
I don't care what they're going to say
        [ch]G/B[/ch]       [ch]Gm/Bb[/ch]
Let the storm rage on
    [ch]C[/ch]
The cold never bothered me anyway


[Break]*

[ch]G[/ch]   [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]


[Verse 2]

[ch]Em[/ch]                    [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]Am[/ch]
  It's funny how some distance makes everything seem small
        [ch]Em[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]Am[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]
And the fears that once controlled me can't get to me at all
[ch]Em[/ch]             [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]Am[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]
Up here in the cold thin air I finally can breathe
  [ch]Em[/ch]            [ch]C[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]A[/ch]
I know I left a life behind but I'm too relieved to grieve


[Pre-chorus 2]

[ch]D[/ch]                            [ch]C[/ch]
 It's time to see what I can do
                             [ch]D[/ch]  
To test the limits and break through
                                 [ch]C[/ch]
No right, no wrong, no rules for me
    [ch]Cadd2[/ch]
I'm free


[Chorus 2]
 
       [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]
Let it go, let it go
     [ch]Em7[/ch]          [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
I am one with the wind and sky  
       [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]
Let it go, let it go 
      [ch]Em7[/ch]           [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
You'll never see me cry
[ch]G[/ch]      [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]     [ch]Em7[/ch]       [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
Here I stand and     here I'll stay
        [ch]G/B[/ch]        [ch]Gm/Bb[/ch]         [ch]C[/ch]
Let the storm rage on        


[Bridge]

[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]   [ch]Em7[/ch]    [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
Standing   frozen      in the life I've chosen
[ch]G[/ch]         [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]    [ch]Em7[/ch]         [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
You won't find me,     the past is far behind me
[ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]Em[/ch]      [ch]C[/ch]
 Buried in the snow


[Bridge 2]**

[ch]C[/ch]
My power flurries through the air into the ground
[ch]C[/ch]
My soul is spiraling in frozen fractals all around
[ch]D[/ch]
And one thought crystallizes like an icy blast
[ch]Em[/ch]        [ch]C[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]              [ch]Am[/ch]  [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
I'm never going back, the past is in the past


[Chorus 3]


       [ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]
Let it go, let it go
         [ch]Em7[/ch]           [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
And I'll rise like the break of dawn
[ch]G[/ch]          [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch] 
Let it go, let it go
     [ch]Em7[/ch]             [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
That perfect girl is gone
[ch]G[/ch]      [ch]Dadd11/F#[/ch]    [ch]Em7[/ch]      [ch]Cadd9[/ch]
Here I stand in the light of day
        [ch]G/B[/ch]        [ch]Gm/Bb[/ch]       
Let the storm rage on        
[ch]C[/ch]
The cold never bothered me anyway



------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Notes
------------------------------------------------------------------

*The break is just two measures, play it the same way you'd play the first 
line of the chorus, but where the second line of the chorus would start, 
begin the second verse. It takes some practice to get the timing right, 
but it should sync up with the recorded Idina Menzel version still at that 
point, so you can listen to it for timing. It's when the orchestral strings 
come in.

**The first three lines of the second bridge (which is the second half of 
the bridge from the original recording) sound better with power chords or
5 chords. The fingerings for these are: C (x355xx) and D (x577xx). 
Additionally, this arrangement is structured in a way that you could drop 
the entire second bridge, if you so choose, but it adds tension and 
complexity to the final third of the song.

Finally, in almost the entire song the Dadd11/F# chord can either be replaced 
by a normal D chord (Chorus) or a Dsus4 chord (all other times). The fingering
is: Dsus4 (xx0233).

content.text:
[Verse 1]

    [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]Dmaj7[/ch]
And now, the end is near,
         [ch]D7[/ch]            [ch]B7[/ch]
And so I face the final curtain,
    [ch]Em7[/ch]                [ch]Em7/D[/ch] 
My friend. I'll say it clear,
             [ch]Em7/C#[/ch]   [ch]A7[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
I'll state my case of which I'm certain.
     [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]D7[/ch]
I've lived a live that's full.
            [ch]G[/ch]             [ch]Gm[/ch]
I traveled each and every highway,
    [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]Asus4[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]
And more, much more than this, I did it m      y way.


[Verse 2]

    [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]Dmaj7[/ch]
Regrets, I've had a few,
         [ch]D7[/ch]                [ch]B7[/ch]
But then again, too few to mention.
  [ch]Em7[/ch]               [ch]Em7/D[/ch]
I did what I had to do,
           [ch]Em7/C#[/ch]   [ch]A7[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]
And saw it thru without exemption.
  [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]D7[/ch]
I planned each charted course,
             [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Gm[/ch]
Each careful step along the byway,
    [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]A[/ch]     [ch]Asus4[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D[/ch]
And more, much more than this, I did it m      y way.


[Verse 3]

               [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]D7[/ch]
Yes there were times, I'm sure you knew,
           [ch]G[/ch]                     [ch]Gsus4[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]
When I bit off more than I could chew,
            [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]A7[/ch]
But thru it all, when there was doubt,
         [ch]F#m[/ch]               [ch]Bm7[/ch]
I ate it up, and spit it out.
           [ch]Em[/ch]               [ch]A[/ch]
I faced it all, and I stood tall,
   [ch]Asus4[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]       [ch]D[/ch]
And did it m      y way.


[Verse 4]

    [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]Dmaj7[/ch]
I've loved, I've laughed and cried.
         [ch]D7[/ch]                [ch]B7[/ch]
I've had my fill; my share of losing.
  [ch]Em7[/ch]               [ch]Em7/D[/ch]
And now, as tears subside,
           [ch]Em7/C#[/ch]   [ch]A7[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]
I find it all so  amusing.
  [ch]D[/ch]                    [ch]D7[/ch]
To think I did all that;
             [ch]G[/ch]              [ch]Gm[/ch]
And may I say - not in a shy way,
    [ch]D[/ch]   [ch]A[/ch]       [ch]Asus4[/ch]        [ch]G[/ch]    [ch]D[/ch]
"No, oh no not me, I did it m   y way".


[Verse 5]

               [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]D7[/ch]
For what is a man, what has he got?
              [ch]G[/ch]          
If not himself, then he has naught.
         [ch]Em7[/ch]               [ch]A7[/ch]
To say the things he truly feels;  
           [ch]F#m[/ch]                [ch]Bm7[/ch] 
And not the words of one who kneels.
           [ch]Em7[/ch]               [ch]A[/ch]         [ch]Asus4[/ch]    [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]
The record shows I took the blows - And did it m   y way!



Starting at the A before my--way, play 002220 "and", 002230 "did", 002250 "it", 
then pick the G as 3xx000 "m....y", before stepping back to D 2xxxxx 0xxxxx 000232 "way"

If you prefer, you can play 022030 and 022020 for Em7/D and Em7/C#. 
Those Em sound slightly better on the 7th if you've got long fingers: Em 779917, Em7/D x5991x, Em7/C# x4991x
